flawed_nl_solution:
Andy weighed 156 + 36 = <<156+36=194>>194 pounds after growing taller.
An eighth of his weight is 1/8 x 194 = <<1/8*194=97/4>>97/4 pounds.
Over the next 3 months, Andy lost 97/4 x 3 = <<97/4*3=291/4>>291/4 pounds.
He now weighs 194 - 291/4 = <<194-291/4=485/4>>485/4 pounds.
Andy weighs 156 - 485/4 = <<156-485/4=139/4>>139/4 pounds less than at the beginning of the year.
#### 139/4

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 192, not 194. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
